title: Meta Launches AI-Powered Video Editor for Reels
full: Meta has introduced a new AI tool for creators that automatically suggests cuts, music, and captions for Instagram Reels. The editor aims to save time and boost engagement by personalizing content suggestions.

title: Google Gemini Adds Multi-Modal Search Features
full: Google has updated Gemini with the ability to understand text, images, and voice together. Users can now upload a photo, ask a voice question, and receive AI-driven results combining multiple formats.

title: Stability AI Releases Free Text-to-3D Tool
full: Stability AI has launched a free web-based tool that lets users generate simple 3D models from text prompts. The tool is designed for indie game developers, hobbyists, and educators.

title: Adobe Enhances Photoshop with Generative Fill 2.0
full: Adobe has rolled out Generative Fill 2.0 in Photoshop, making AI edits faster and more realistic. The update includes new lighting adjustments and better blending for professional use.

title: Nvidia Partners with Indian Startups for AI Training
full: Nvidia has signed agreements with several Indian startups to provide GPUs and training programs. The move is part of expanding AI infrastructure in emerging markets.

title: YouTube Tests AI-Powered Comment Summaries
full: YouTube is experimenting with an AI tool that automatically summarizes long comment sections under videos. This helps viewers quickly catch up on discussions without scrolling endlessly.

title: Amazon Alexa Gets Major AI Upgrade
full: Amazon has upgraded Alexa with conversational AI, allowing it to remember context and respond more naturally. The update also introduces multi-turn conversations for smart home controls.

title: Tesla Expands AI Team for Humanoid Robots
full: Tesla is aggressively hiring AI engineers to accelerate the development of Optimus, its humanoid robot project. Elon Musk claims Optimus could eventually outnumber Tesla cars in production.

title: OpenAI Adds Memory to ChatGPT
full: OpenAI has begun rolling out a 'memory' feature in ChatGPT, allowing it to remember user preferences and context across conversations. Users can manage, reset, or turn off memory anytime.

title: Samsung Showcases AI-Driven Health Features
full: Samsung has revealed new AI-powered health monitoring tools for Galaxy devices, including stress tracking, sleep improvement suggestions, and personalized exercise recommendations.
